comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Walter Francis "Chick" Keating (August 8, 1891 – July 13, 1959) was a shortstop in Major League Baseball. He played for the Chicago Cubs and Philadelphia Phillies. Wikipedia article is missing a picture. Added: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Chick_Keating,_Chicago_NL...
